author: satos.hier
created_time: September 07, 2022, 04:47:28 PMLast edit: September 12, 2022, 06:34:27 PM by satos.hier
content: Satoshier is an all-in-one online Bitcoin wallet with anonymity exclusivity and high security. It allows fast and free direct transactions. Combining ease of use with a high level of privacy, anonymity and security, Satoshier offers free Bitcoin accounts, which can be accessed 24/7 worldwide from your laptop. , desktop or mobile devices alike.OUR SERVICEAnonymous & secure: We guarantee your privacy, anonymity and the security of your funds. Avoid verifications (KYC) and restrictions.Affiliates: Invite your friends and receive 40% of all Bitcoin deposited by your guests. The percentage is disbursed by us.Instant Withdraw: We support withdrawals directly to your wallet for a very low fee. We also have free withdrawals by Microwallet.FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONSHow to create an account on Satoshier?Simply visit the connect page and enter your username, email and choose a password. Check your inbox, look for a message from Satoshier and confirm your account by clicking on the confirmation link in the message.Are you ready!What currencies are supported on Satoshier?Satoshier currently supports the following cryptocurrency:Bitcoin.Bitcoin BEP20(coming soon).Bitcoin TRC20(coming soon).How much does it cost to open a satoshier account?Any! All Satoshier accounts are 100% free for customers!Do I need to prove my identity on satoshier?For now it will not be necessary, it is possible in the future.
